channel.title: [pi] help
channel.description:
For some reason, whenever I switch to curses on my server using altar #411 (chaos altar), it switches to curse prayers perfectly. After that though, I log out and it saves my curses. Everything is fine until is see the character files and see that the variable ' Curses ' is always set to false, even when I know that I have switched to curses. In addition, the curses/normal prayers still save perfectly upon logout.. Is there a way to fix to make this variable turn true when I switch to curse prayers?
Thank you, here is the code in playersave.java itself:
[code]} else if (token.equals("Curses")) { p.curses = Boolean.parseBoolean(token2);[/code]
Please help! :confused:

item.title: [pi] help
item.dc:creator: @Code_kai Code kai
item.description:

For some reason, whenever I switch to curses on my server using altar #411 (chaos altar), it switches to curse prayers perfectly.
After that though, I log out and it saves my curses. Everything is fine until is see the character files and see that the variable ’ Curses ’ is always
set to false, even when I know that I have switched to curses. In addition, the curses/normal prayers still save perfectly upon logout…
Is there a way to fix to make this variable turn true when I switch to curse prayers?

Thank you, here is the code in playersave.java itself:

} else if (token.equals("Curses")) { p.curses = Boolean.parseBoolean(token2);

Please help!
